hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Zaid said:"Allah's Messenger would say each phrase of the call (for prayer) two times, for the Adhan and the Iqamah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الإِقَامَةَ مَثْنَى مَثْنَى
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Saying The Phrases Of The Iqamah Two Times Each
